page.title: 18BILSDALE STUDY GROUP.
page.content: The summer meetings have been outings to local places of interest and winter meetings have been held in the village hall.At the annual general meetings in November the treasurer and secretary present their reports, followed by a members exhibition of any items of interest. Most meetings are recorded in a news letter written by the secretary and duplicated free by Mr. Malcolm Harker of Chisel Hill Mill.Copies are sent to those requesting them and a copy is given to Stokesley Library. The meetings are usually reported in the Darlington & Stockton Times.
